A collection of types.

RemovePlugin(Plugin)

Removes the specified plugin from the manager. As an assembly can't be removed during execution, the plugin will be disabled only after a re-run.

public void RemovePlugin(Plugin plugin)

Parameters

plugin Plugin

The plugin to remove.
